snippet: Benjamin Millepied and Nico Muhly, the men behind “Two Hearts,” discuss how they meld choreography and music in creating new work.
abstract: Roslyn Sulcas hold conversations with choreographer Benjamin Millepied and composer Nico Muhly, whose latest work Two Hearts is set to premiere at the New York City Ballet's spring gala. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: THE choreographer Benjamin Millepied, 34, and the composer Nico Muhly, 30, have created four pieces together since 2007. The most recent, ''Two Hearts,'' will have its premiere at the New York City Ballet's spring gala on Thursday at the David H. Koch Theater. In recent conversations with Roslyn Sulcas, in New York and on the phone, they talked about their newest work and the nature of their collaboration. These are excerpts from the conversation. Q. How did you meet?

headline.main: Two Heads Work Together For Multiple Feet
